txt.en: Magh么rdo asked for your opinion on what should be done about Furtherholm's cats. You made a decision and acted accordingly. You should report to Magh么rdo at Furtherholm's harbour, near the waterfall.

'[placeholder], you may have noticed many cats about the harbour. I am not sure what to do about them. Among my people, cats are believed to bring good luck. No Umbari dromund would dare sail without one. To do so would bring bad fortune to any voyage!

'But it seems that among our visitors, not everyone appreciates cats as they should. Some people have complained, calling them pests, and one man claims they make him sneeze!

'My friend, you are a visitor. What say you? Should they stay or should they go?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Ah, you return for your reward!\n\n'Do you think that was the correct decision, [placeholder]? Anyway, I do not doubt that the same choice will have to be made again tomorrow. Cats are inevitable.'
Many stray cats have made the Furtherholm harbour their home. What should be done about them?
Magh么rdo is unsure of what to do about the cats. He has asked for your opinion - should they stay or should they go?
